state_summary: Medium CEO Tony Stubblebine shares his company's journey to profitability, including product changes, investor restructuring, renegotiated loans, cost-cutting measures, and layoffs.
evidence: Medium was losing $2.6 million per month when Stubblebine joined in 2022
The company had 760,000 members but was losing money every month
Medium introduced Boost, a way to add human expertise to recommendations
The company renegotiated its loans and eliminated liquidation preferences
Medium simplified its governance to just one tranche of investors
